1.q_string:
Two completely miscible liquids A & B form an ideal solution. What is the vapour pressure of solution containing 2 moles of A and 3 moles of B at 300K?

[Given: At 300 K, Vapour pr. of pure liquid A(PAo) = 100 torr and Vapour pr. of pure liquid B (PBo) = 300 torr]
For an Ideal solution, which of the following option are true?

q_option: A-B interaction >sum of A-A Interaction and B- B interaction
A-B interaction =sum of A-A Interaction and B- B interaction
A-B interaction < sum of A-A Interaction and B- B interaction

q_option: Both A and R are true and R is correct explanation of A
Both A and R are true and R is not a correct explanation of A
A is true but R is false.
A is false but R is true.
